name: HighScore (itch)
description:
The game made by me and my nephew(7) for One Minute Game Jam 2.

Player 1 Controller : W-A-D to move and jump. Space for shooting.

Player 2 Controller : Up-Left-Right arrow keys to move and jump. Left click for shooting.

Have fun and make higher score than your friend !

(Please Use FullScreen Mode to Play)
